00007 #pragma once
00008 #include <unordered_map>
00009 #include "lsf/basic/singleton.hpp"
00010 #include "lsf/asio/async/proactor_service.hpp"
00011 #include "lsf/asio/async/epoll_event_driver.hpp"
00012 #include "lsf/asio/async/poll_event_driver.hpp"
00013 
00014 namespace lsf {
00015 namespace asio {
00016 
00017 using async::ProactorSerivce;
00018 
00020 // IOService
00021 class IOService {
00022 public:
00023     static const int FLAG_READ  = async::BasicEventDriver::FLAG_READ;
00024     static const int FLAG_WRITE = async::BasicEventDriver::FLAG_WRITE;
00025     static const int FLAG_ERR   = async::BasicEventDriver::FLAG_ERR;
00026 
00027 public:
00028     static ProactorSerivce *Instance() {
00029         if (IOServiceContent::Instance()->use_epoll) {
00030             if (IOServiceContent::Instance()->epoll_service == nullptr)
00031                 IOServiceContent::Instance()->epoll_service = new ProactorSerivce(new async::EpollEventDriver);
00032             return IOServiceContent::Instance()->epoll_service;
00033         } else {
00034             if (IOServiceContent::Instance()->poll_service == nullptr)
00035                 IOServiceContent::Instance()->poll_service = new ProactorSerivce(new async::PollEventDriver);
00036             return IOServiceContent::Instance()->poll_service;
00037         }
00038     }
00039 
00040     static ProactorSerivce &Reference() { return *Instance(); }
00041 
00042     static void UseEpoll() { IOServiceContent::Instance()->use_epoll = true; }
00043     static void UsePoll() { IOServiceContent::Instance()->use_epoll = false; }
00044 
00045 protected:
00047     // IOService Content
00048     class IOServiceContent : public lsf::basic::Singleton<IOServiceContent> {
00049     public:
00050         IOServiceContent() {}
00051 
00052     public:
00053         bool use_epoll = false;
00054         ProactorSerivce *epoll_service = nullptr;
00055         ProactorSerivce *poll_service = nullptr;
00056     };
00057 
00058 protected:
00059     IOService() {}                            // construtor is hidden
00060     IOService(IOService const& );             // copy constructor is hidden
00061     IOService &operator=(IOService const& );  // copy assignment is hidde
00062 };
00063 
00064 }  // end of namespace asio
00065 }  // end of namespace lsf
